title: 2-in-1 Hair & Body Shampoo HYMM™
shortDesc: One man, one solution: the 2-in-1 Hair & Body Shampoo cleanses the body from head to toe and bathes the skin in well-being. A formula created with Water Mint Extract and Sea Minerals cleanses both body & hair while leaving a fresh scent and provides light conditioning effect to the hair.
